summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1600, for the improvement of Mercer Street, from Fairview Avenue to Westlake Avenue, and Terry Avenue North from Mercer Street to Republican Street, all in the City of Seattle by grading and regarding and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 17153 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
